title: Not getting credit in new game mode
body: I am not getting any credit for the krakens that I spend during the games. At first, I thought it was because I had lost most of the games, but even during the games I do win I'm not getting credit. Is anyone else having this issue? It would be very hard to believe that I've won 2 games yet didn't spend any Krakens...

replies.body:
Hey Schnei~ 

You cannot earn the rewards at the same time. You have to win 2 games, and then in your  third (or next game after winning 2), it will count spending krakens. 

Given that info, are you still having issues having your krakens counted?
NO,  It's all good now. Thank you very much.

So I am having the same issue as he is. The Kraken isn't being counted. I understand that you can't complete more than 1 objective per game but I've had 4 games and not a single one has recorded me spending Kraken and I've won 3 games already
